infobox.Japanese title:: 都会のカラス  (Tokai no Karasu)
infobox.Cast:: Conan Edogawa  Detective Boys  Kazunobu Chiba  Detective Terashima
infobox.Character design:: Mari Tominaga  Keiko Sasaki (sub-character)  Kumiko Shishido (design works)
infobox.Voice Cast::
Voice Cast:



Minami Takayama as Conan Edogawa  Yukiko Iwai as Ayumi Yoshida  Wataru Takagi as Genta Kojima  Ikue Otani as Mitsuhiko Tsuburaya  Isshin Chiba as Kazunobu Chiba  Kōichi Tōchika as Detective Terashima  Takeharu Onishi as Resident  Yoshiaki Takagi as Worker  Keiko Yamamoto as Tatsue Egami  Ginka Sakura as Housewife  Miho Kashiwao as Housewife  Misuzu Sasaki as Housewife  Nozomu Sasaki as Noriko's lover  Junko Iwao as Noriko Imai
infobox.Closing song:: Nemuru Kimi no Yokogao ni Hohoemi o

sections.Situation:
An old lady is found dead after a pot falls on her from the top of a building where she lived alone.

Chiba is sent to investigate, and Conan helps him to figure out who the culprit really is. The news, of course, comes as a shock to Ayumi, who just happens to look up to the culprit.

sections.Trivia:
- The lottery ticket is 363, as this episode.
- The pastry shop at Beika Station reappears in The Synchronicity Case and Running Away in a Game.
sections.Quotes:
- Ayumi Yoshida:
Even though I'm just a kid, I do understand. I can understand just how sad she must have been at that moment. But... Still... She went far too far!  (わかるよ、子供にだって。その時お姉さんが、どんなに悲しかったかぐらい。でも...やっぱり...いけないことはいけないんだよ！)
- Conan Edogawa:
You're absolutely right, Ayumi-chan. The city crows sure are sinners.  (その通りだよ、歩美ちゃん。罪な奴だぜ、都会のカラス。)
